channel.title: Weapon Slot
channel.description: Does anyone know how i could change a weapon from being wielded in weapon slot to the shield spot? If you do can you tell me?

item.title: Weapon Slot
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

go to Item4.java and look for the one called shield under it ull see a lot of numbers(codes)
put the id of ur item onto the shield place then close>>save>>compile
then ur done

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Slot
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If you could shift the models position, you would have to hex edit the model and change the vertex skins from #32 to #1C. If you couldn’t move the model you would have to invert all the X vertices as well by ANDing with #f000.

Easiest way would be to just remodel the weapon.
There’s a datmaker somewhere…

Read full topic
